subject: Lab Results - James Smith (Patient ID: 1)
content: Dr. Mitchell, Lab results for James Smith are now available. Peak flow measurements show improvement since last visit. Please review in patient chart.

subject: Schedule Change - Maria Garcia
content: Patient Maria Garcia has requested to reschedule tomorrow's 2 PM appointment to Friday at 10 AM. Please confirm if this works with your schedule.

subject: Prescription Refill Request - Robert Chen
content: Refill request received for Robert Chen's pirfenidone. Current prescription expires in 5 days. Please approve or adjust dosage as needed.

subject: Alert - Aisha Khan Wearable Data
content: Dr. Mitchell, Aisha Khan's wearable device reported elevated heart rate readings over the past 24 hours. Average 105 bpm, with spikes to 130 bpm. Patient reports feeling short of breath during exertion. May need follow-up assessment.

subject: Patient Survey Results - Emily Johnson
content: Emily Johnson completed her pre-appointment health questionnaire. She reports increased fatigue and cough frequency. Survey results have been added to her chart for your review before tomorrow's appointment.

subject: CT Scan Results - Robert Chen
content: Dr. Mitchell, reviewed high-resolution CT for Robert Chen. Findings show stable interstitial pattern compared to prior study from 6 months ago. No new infiltrates. Detailed report uploaded to PACS.

subject: Prior Authorization Approved - Maria Garcia
content: Good news - prior authorization for pulmonary rehabilitation program has been approved for Maria Garcia. She can begin sessions next week. Authorization valid for 12 weeks.

subject: Culture Results - Emily Johnson
content: Sputum culture for Emily Johnson shows Pseudomonas aeruginosa. Sensitivity testing indicates susceptibility to tobramycin and ciprofloxacin. Recommend reviewing current antibiotic therapy.
